Title: The Land Before Time II: The Great Valley Adventure
Writer: Dev Ross (screenplay), John Loy (screenplay), John Ludin (screenplay), Judy Freudberg (characters), Tony Geiss (characters)
Actors: Scott McAfee, Candace Hutson, Heather Hogan, Jeff Bennett
Plot: This time, while building a hideaway in their new home of the Great Valley, Littlefoot and the gang rescue a mysterious egg from two scheming egg-nappers and make a starling surprise - and new friend - when the egg hatches.
